string.name: thisWeek
string.comment:
thisWeek
This is your best Puzzle Storm record this week.
Appears in the Puzzle Storm dashboard: https://lichess.org/storm/dashboard

thisMonth
This is your best Puzzle Storm record this month.

string.name: allTime
string.comment:
allTime
This is your best Puzzle Storm record at any time in the history of the account.
Appears in the Puzzle Storm dashboard: https://lichess.org/storm/dashboard

string.name: thisRunHasExpired
string.comment:
thisRunHasExpired
Runs of Puzzle Storm are deleted after a time.
